pkgmetadata.longdescription: Space-Time Change of Support // Spatio-temporal change of support (STCOS) methods are designed for statistical inference on geographic and time domains which differ from those on which the data were observed. In particular, a parsimonious class of STCOS models supporting Gaussian outcomes was introduced by Bradley, Wikle, and Holan doi:10.1002/sta4.94. The 'stcos' package contains tools which facilitate use of STCOS models.
